function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Viruses spreading in built environments","Impact":"Increased risk of infection and transmission of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Implementing measures for better indoor air quality, natural lighting, and sanitation","Technologies":"Air purifiers, UV disinfection, smart ventilation systems","People":"Residents, visitors, workers","Owner":"Architects, building managers, homeowners"},{"Description":"Permanent changes in architectural design and lifestyle","Impact":"Shift in design concepts and layouts, potential for inadequate living conditions","Mitigation":"Adapting architectural designs for remote activities, prioritizing indoor health and well-being","Technologies":"Smart home technologies, digital infrastructure for remote work and study","People":"Architects, urban planners, homeowners","Owner":"Architects, building managers, city planners"},{"Description":"Uncertainty of living with contagious viruses long-term","Impact":"Increased anxiety and mental health concerns, potential for societal upheaval","Mitigation":"Promoting mental health support, community engagement, and public education","Technologies":"Telemedicine services, mental health apps, community outreach platforms","People":"Community members, individuals at risk, healthcare workers","Owner":"Local governments, healthcare providers, community organizations"}]}
